_sText:
So as my previous map didn't work out very well. I decided to remake it. using the feedback I got on the old map.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes:

Textures: The entire map have got new textures.

Levels: Last level had ben Replaced, cus it sucked hard. and a new level have ben added.

Prespeed: so a big problem was the "too much prespeed" so I have added and extended some blocks, to prevent this.

Sound: so I added some soundscape music to the map as requested by almost anyone that make a critic post.

Boosters: so I tryed fix the boosters so you cant skip the level just by spamming with glock.

Nodraw bug: so believe it or not, while testing previous map the nodraw bug wasen't there for me?, only when I played on other servers, I was albe to see the bug.
so I tryed to fix it, but as I could't see what was wrong I just hope it work now.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Other things:

Light problem?: So my biggest problem with this map is probley the light... it is really bad, and change though levels.
I really tryed get it work, but it was just too hard for me to find a way where it would work perfectly...
If anyone have some tips or triks on light like this. FOR GOD SAKE PLZZ TELL MEE!
